All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Bill
This class generates the bill for an order and stores it in a specific location
BillValidator
A class that validates an order.
Client
Client is a simple class that stores the instance variable of a client.
ClientDAO
This class is responsable for making the necessary operation to the Client database(insert,delete,display).
Command
The class for storing commands using an Object instance variable and the use of booleans variables that are used as flags to show the type of command.
ConnectionFactory
This class is used for creating the connection between java and the database.
Controller
This class controlls the main functions of the OrderManagement aplication.
MainClass
This is the class that contains the main method
Order
Order is a simple class that stores the instance variable of an order.
OrderDAO
This class is responsable for making the necessary operation to the Order database(make order,display).
PdfReport
This class creates a .pdf file that contains a table for s specific report
Product
Product is a simple class that stores the instance variable of a product.
ProductDAO
This class is responsable for making the necessary operation to the Product database(insert,delete,display).
Report
Report is a simple class that stores the instance variable of a report.
ReportDao
This class is responsable for making the necessary operation to the Report database(insert,display).
